description:
The `Focusable` component can be used to identify when an element receives focus. `Focusable` accepts a `render` or `children` method that returns content which must have exactly one [focusable](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/interaction.html#focusable-area) element. ```javascript --- type: example --- {(options) => { console.log(options) return
{options.focused && ( I'm focused! )} }} ``` Easily implement a "skip to content" link for keyboard-only or screenreader users. ```javascript --- type: example --- {({ focused }) => { return (
{ focused ? Skip to content : Skip to content } Tab into this code example to see a 'Skip to Content' link appear
) }} ```
title: Focusable__README
